description:
Breakout Birdie Adventure will challenge your skill and reflexes to the max!

The aim is to bounce your Birdie around the level as you attempt to bash all the blocks and escape through the exit portal! Simply tap to bounce the Birdie while avoiding the multitude of hazards that litter each level and collect power-ups to gain special abilities to aid you on your quest!

FEATURES:
- A fantastically fun arcade game!
- Cool power-ups to enhance your abilities!
- 48 unique and challenging levels to unlock!
- Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
- Intuitive touch-screen controls!
- Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
- Bright and bubbly background tunes!
- Suitable for players of all ages!
name: Breakout Birdie Adventure
